extendedInfo.description: Run Aby! Ruuuun!Aby Escape is a free race game operating completely in 3D and offering varied gameplay, which will require you to be as quick as you can. Help Aby, the unluckiest and clumsiest raccoon, in his mad race to escape from his assailants. Whether being pursued by the hunters in his native forest, by the police in town or by the bikers on Route 66.5, Aby never stops running to escape from all these dangers.Take a look far ahead and make your way through the 2 game modes:UNLIMITED MODEAby Escape offers an unlimited game mode devoted specifically to scoring. Slide, jump and accelerate to dodge all the obstacles in your path! Collect coins and unlock loads of power-ups. Achieve the best score you can and complete 50 exclusive challenges.STORY MODEIn Aby Escape, progress through the 30 levels of the game, split across 3 different universes, and take on every kind of obstacle and unique situation: a catapult, an American football stadium, elephants, trucks, and a cemetery, just to name a few. Get an overview of the next update by completing Story mode.Features :-50 challenges to take on in Unlimited mode-30 game levels in Story mode-Lots of enemies to shake off or avoid (hunters, policemen, bikers, footballers, elephants, etc.)-Lots of power-ups available (Ghost, Magnet, Extra life, Shield, etc.)-Objects to unlock (characters, shoes, etc.)But watch out and donât get hit in the face by a tree, elephant or American footballer!Discover the free Aby Escape game available now!--Aby Escape was loved by:- iPhonesoft.fr: *17/20*http://iphonesoft.fr/2012/04/28/test-aby-escape- 148apps.com: *4/5*http://www.148apps.com/reviews/aby-escape-review/- Applenapps.com: *4/5*http://applenapps.com/review/aby-escape-temple-running-with-a-raccoon/--Try out our other Bulkypix games available now!- Babel Running :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.babelrunningpremium&hl=fr- iSlash : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.duellogames.islash&hl=fr- Saving2 Private Sheep 2:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.sps2&hl=fr- Kung Fu Rabbithttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.KFR--Find the latest Bulkypix news and videos, along with all your favorite games:- Bukypix : http://www.bulkypix.com- YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/bulkypix - Twitter : https://twitter.com/Bulkypix- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Bulkypix- Tumblr : www.tumblr.com/tagged/bulkypix--http://www.pixelratio.es/http://www.twitter.com/Pixel_Ratiohttp://www.facebook.com/pages/Pixel-Ratio-SC/186041741443088
